org.waarp.openr66.dao

Interface AbstractDAO<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BusinessDAO, HostDAO, LimitDAO, MultipleMonitorDAO, RuleDAO, TransferDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBBusinessDAO, DBHostDAO, DBLimitDAO, DBMultipleMonitorDAO, DBRuleDAO, DBTransferDAO, H2TransferDAO, MariaDBTransferDAO, MySqlDBTransferDAO, OracleTransferDAO, PostgreSQLTransferDAO, StatementExecutor, XMLBusinessDAO, XMLHostDAO, XMLLimitDAO, XMLRuleDAO, XMLTransferDAO

    public interface AbstractDAO<E>
extends Cloneable
    Interface to interact with objects in the persistance layer

      • find

        List<E> find(List<Filter> filters,
             String field,
             boolean asc)
      throws DAOConnectionException
        Retrieve all objects corresponding to the given filters in a List from the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        filters - List of filter
        field - field to sort on
        asc - True for ascending, False for descending order
        Throws:
        DAOConnectionException - If data access error occurs

             String field,
             boolean asc,
             int limit,
             int offset)

        filters - List of filter
        field - field to sort on
        asc - True for ascending, False for descending order
        limit - max number of items to get
        offset - start for items to get

        DAOConnectionException - If data access error occurs

            String toSet)
     throws DAOConnectionException
        Update all objects corresponding to the given filters in a List from the persistance layer

        filters - List of filter
        toSet - field to update as "field1 = value1, field2 = value2, ..."

        DAOConnectionException - If data access error occurs

        E select(String id)
  throws DAOConnectionException,
         DAONoDataException
        Retrieve the object with the specified id from the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        id - id of the object requested
        Throws:
        DAOConnectionException - If a data access error occurs
        DAONoDataException - if no data are available

      • exist

        boolean exist(String id)
       throws DAOConnectionException
        Verify if an object with the specified id exists in the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        id - id of the object verified
        Returns:
        true if a object with the specified id exist; false if no object correspond to the specified id.
        Throws:
        DAOConnectionException - If a data access error occurs
